function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Deficient traditional IEQ measurement tools","Impact":"Partial and inaccurate understanding of IEQ characteristics","Mitigation":"Upgrade to new technologies for IEQ monitoring","Technologies":"Internet of Things (IoT) and big data technologies","People":"Building occupants, researchers","Owner":"Facility management, researchers"},{"Description":"Lack of IEQ information interaction with occupants","Impact":"Inability to create a better indoor environment based on occupants' needs","Mitigation":"Develop systems for IEQ information interaction with occupants","Technologies":"Communication technologies, IoT","People":"Building occupants, researchers","Owner":"Facility management, researchers"}]}
